name: HexTrain
description:
THIS IS A MOBILE GAME !

You are downloading a .apk, wich works in android, not windows

This is a proto made for an internship test in 5 days. Hence the low quality and low content

The train need to go to the station but some rails are missing. Your job is to place thos tracks back on the road and make sure that the train can reach its goal. 11 puzzle to overcome, each more difficult than the previous one.
